Title: The 33
Overview: Based on the true story of the collapse of a mine in San Jose, Chile—that left 33 miners isolated underground for 69 days.
production_companies: Alcon Entertainment, Phoenix Pictures, Fabula, Half Circle
Cast: Antonio Banderas, Rodrigo Santoro, Juliette Binoche
